name: senseorganfacts
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sense organ facts
des: This skill gives facts about sense organs. There are five main sense organs are your eyes, ears, nose, tongue and skin.Senses are important because they help us understand the environment around us. Stimuli are signals that trigger the senses. ... Each sense organ includes receptors that capture relevant stimuli for transmission to the brain. The receptors in the skin are mechanoreceptors and thermoreceptors.
